# `public-bucket`

```sh
/cdn/:folder/:filename https://github.com/vimfn/public-bucket/blob/main/:folder/:filename
/r/cdn/:folder/:filename https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vimfn/public-bucket/main/:folder/:filename

/pb/:folder/:filename https://github.com/vimfn/public-bucket/blob/main/:folder/:filename
/r/pb/:folder/:filename https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vimfn/public-bucket/main/:folder/:filename

/bucket/:folder/:filename https://github.com/vimfn/public-bucket/blob/main/:folder/:filename
/r/bucket/:folder/:filename https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vimfn/public-bucket/main/:folder/:filename
```
